Question: Ningbo Leader Import & Export Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Ningbo Leader Import & Export Co., Ltd

Product: LED Plant Growth Lamps

- Specializes in LED plant grow lights
- Offers a wide range of products including plant grow lights, light stands, and planting tools
- Professional R&D team and cultivation laboratory for technical support and product development
- Products are CE, TUV, UL, and ROHS certified
- Offers hassle-free after-sales service with a two-year warranty
- Product range includes various types of plant stands, LED growerhouses, and gardening accessories
